Articles.Author: Eddie Fu
Articles.Title: Sony Pictures Acquires Alamo Drafthouse Cinema in Landmark Deal
Articles.Description:
The acquisition makes Sony the first major Hollywood studio to own a movie theater in over 75 years.
Sony Pictures Acquires Alamo Drafthouse Cinema in Landmark Deal
Eddie Fu
Articles.Content:
Sony Pictures Entertainment (SPE) has announced its acquisition of the theater chain Alamo Drafthouse Cinema.
As The Hollywood Reporter points out, the landmark deal marks the first time a major Hol… [+1559 chars]
